member.name: DXGI_HARDWARE_COMPOSITION_SUPPORT_FLAGS
member.summary: Describes which levels of hardware composition are supported.

member.name: DXGI_HARDWARE_COMPOSITION_SUPPORT_FLAGS.DXGI_HARDWARE_COMPOSITION_SUPPORT_FLAG_FULLSCREEN
member.summary: This flag specifies that swapchain composition can be facilitated in a performant manner using hardware for fullscreen applications.

member.name: DXGI_HARDWARE_COMPOSITION_SUPPORT_FLAGS.DXGI_HARDWARE_COMPOSITION_SUPPORT_FLAG_WINDOWED
member.summary: This flag specifies that swapchain composition can be facilitated in a performant manner using hardware for windowed applications.

member.name: DXGI_HARDWARE_COMPOSITION_SUPPORT_FLAGS.DXGI_HARDWARE_COMPOSITION_SUPPORT_FLAG_CURSOR_STRETCHED
member.summary: This flag specifies that swapchain composition facilitated using hardware can cause the cursor to appear stretched.
